toxic community, no anticheat system, and unless you have a full team of people willing to play and actually take ranked seriously you'll lose and derank over and over after someone abandons or inevitably starts teamkilling for their own entertainment. also, silver games are more challenging than MG or LEM games because the people that can't advance in those ranks just smurf and make silver unplayable.  do yourself a favor and don't bother with this heaping pile of shit that valve refuses to dedicate time to fix and make playable.
Horrible game with a horrible community with lootboxes
